document_data.name: ''The Morokh''
document_data.mainbody: The mysterious individual only known as '''''The Morokh''''' was a [[warlock]] active in [[Almraiven]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/417/Eye on the Realms: The Sword of Spells}}
document_data.Abilities: Although little was known about ''The Morokh'', they were said to be a formidable [[spellcaster]] who got help from a [[flying snake]] and relied on an impressive arsenal of battle-oriented [[:category:magic items|magic items]].
document_data.History: Sometime between the {{yearlinkName|1449}} and the {{yearlinkName|1454}}, ''The Morokh'' suffered an attack from the ''[[Sword of Savras]]'' and consequently lost access to their pact magic. They however retained the ability to wield their magic items.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: According to rumors, ''The Morokh'' never slept.
